title: Thunderbird 115.13.0 (64 Bit) ... Panel Fonts Are Too Small ...
content:
I am running Thunderbird 115.13.0 (64 Bit) on a Mint 22 OS ... & have spent most of the day yesterday & a couple hours today to find the solution to the SMALL FONT SIZE in the "Folders Panel" in Thunderbird" & have checked several threads of others having the SAME PROBLEM ...

    • I FOUND THE SOLUTION TODAY!!
    • i simply want to save a ton of people the grief that I went through to solve the SMALL FONT SIZE in the various panels in Thunderbird ...

SOLUTION: On the Top Right of the Thunderbird Screen ... CLICK ON THE THREE BARS ... and you will notice that The SIXTH ITEM DOWN IN THE DROP DOWN MENU ... IS "FONT" ... THIS is WHERE you solve your Font Size Problem!! Simply click on the (+) sign to increase the font or click on the (-) sign to decrease the font size!! Viola!! Problem Solved!!

I read where people were directed to the config file under settings and setting up a chrome file ... but you don't need ANY OF THAT ... you DO However need to make sure that in the config file that it is set to the default setting of (-1.0) if it isn't ... & all of us need to apologize to the developers for saying that this updated version of Thunderbird is bad programing ... Because It Isn't!! They gave us a SIMPLE MENU to fix the font size ... we just didn't know WHERE it was!!

Blessings ... I hope this helps a ton of people with the same problem that I had so you DON'T waste a bunch of time and/or stop using Thunderbird because it is the BEST Email Program Out There!!
creator: rod50

title: Edit Single Calendar Event - Send and Close
content: Running Thunderbird v115.14.0. Edit single event. No [Save] button, only [Send and Close]. This doesn't appear for a recurring event, which displays [Save and Close]. Not good.
creator: BPaul_H

title: Thunderbird... receiving full emails on every email received
content: To start, I do receive most of my emails intact. However, there are the occasional email only partially appears. I see enough of it to know who it is from. As an example, I get a bill from xfinity and only what appears to be the graphic part shows up, but, the details of the body of the email do not appear. So I don't know what they want to tell me. All this is in regular Thunderbird. That being said, when I open Thunderbird in troubleshooting mode the full email is then visible. I have tried the reset everything and nothing seems to work. I have taken to only opening Thunderbird in troubleshooting mode as then I am assured of seeing the full emails, text and graphics. Maybe you can help me adjust something to fix this problem. Oh, I am using windows 10 on a pc. Thanks, Dic Bason
creator: dicbason

title: Thunderbird v115 - Snagit Can't Use PrintScreen Hotkey
content:
I use Snagit 2024 to capture the screen, since I'm in the support and documentation business. I just upgraded Thunderbird from v102 to v115.14.0. Now, when I press the PrintScreen key it is suppose to bring up the Snagit capture cross-hair but it doesn't - it always did in TB v102. The worst part is if I click a dropdown menu then press [PrintScreen] the menu always stays open. Because I cannot use the [PrintScreen] key clicking on the capture icon in the Snagit menu closes the dropdown menu so I cannot capture it.

What in the world is Thunderbird doing hijacking the [PrintScreen] key? Or is it? Why doesn't the hotkey work for other applications? Anyone know? Thanks,
creator: BPaul_H

title: forgotten password
content: I've forgotten my password so can't read emails so cannot receive an email answer
creator: romadix

title: Very odd behaviour and cannot reset.
content:
Hello. Thuderbird has been acting strangely for a few days, lots of Not Responding messages and then it sorts itself out. But now, when I open an ordinary e-mail, it opens up in a Send window! With the message which you will find in the attached Image. My version = 128.1.1 esr (64 bit) Lenovo Laptop Windows 10 Grateful for any help folks.

Howard
creator: SmithyHouse

title: Quick Filter Still extremely slow
content:
Quick Filter is still extremely slow on the newest version of Thunderbird (128.1.1esr). I asked a question about this previously. It was reported as a bug (see links below) and it says in the report it was fixed, but the problem still seems to be there in the newest version. Any idea when this will be fixed, or if there is anything I can do about it?

There is a thread about it on reddit. https://www.reddit.com/r/Thunderbird/comments/1e6hryp/quick_filter_is_super_slow_in_128/

There was a bug reported, and it is listed as closed (solved). Here is the bug report thread: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1908761

Thanks for you help.
creator: Lynn.Kistler

title: Thunderbird 128.1.1esr (64-bit)
content: Hi to all, after the latest update to 128.1.1esr (64-bit) the quick filter is very very slow and hangs the PC (WIN 11, 16 GB RAM and SSD) for 10-15 seconds. Thunderbird no longer responds and this happens all the time, also with different machines. The version before the update was just fine. Anyone with the same issue? Can you give me some hints/solutions? Thanks, Antonio
creator: antonio.diguardo

title: ik kan geen mails naar GMAIL adressen versturen.
content:
Beste heer/mevrouw,

Het lukt niet om mails te sturen naar gmail-adressen. Naar andere adressen lukt wel. Heb al verschillende mailadressen geprobeerd. krijg deze melding:

This is the mail system at host mailout07.hostplan.nl.

I'm sorry to have to inform you that your message could not be delivered to one or more recipients. It's attached below.

For further assistance, please send mail to postmaster.

If you do so, please include this problem report. You can delete your own text from the attached returned message. 

                  The mail system

<christinekortland@gmail.com>: host gmail-smtp-in.l.google.com[142.250.102.27] 

   said: 550-5.7.26 Your email has been blocked because the sender is    unauthenticated. 550-5.7.26 Gmail requires all senders to authenticate with    either SPF or DKIM. 550-5.7.26  550-5.7.26  Authentication results:    550-5.7.26  DKIM = did not pass 550-5.7.26  SPF [grafkunstenaar.nl] with    ip: [91.217.57.103] = did not pass 550-5.7.26  550-5.7.26  For instructions    on setting up authentication, go to 550 5.7.26    https://support.google.com/mail/answer/81126#authentication    a640c23a62f3a-a868f486292si527771966b.522 - gsmtp (in reply to end of DATA    command)


Reporting-MTA: dns; mailout07.hostplan.nl X-Postfix-Queue-ID: CE02B70D X-Postfix-Sender: rfc822; info@grafkunstenaar.nl Arrival-Date: Sun, 25 Aug 2024 11:22:04 +0200 (CEST)

Final-Recipient: rfc822; christinekortland@gmail.com Original-Recipient: rfc822;christinekortland@gmail.com Action: failed Status: 5.7.26 Remote-MTA: dns; gmail-smtp-in.l.google.com Diagnostic-Code: smtp; 550-5.7.26 Your email has been blocked because the 

   sender is unauthenticated. 550-5.7.26 Gmail requires all senders to    authenticate with either SPF or DKIM. 550-5.7.26  550-5.7.26    Authentication results: 550-5.7.26  DKIM = did not pass 550-5.7.26  SPF    [grafkunstenaar.nl] with ip: [91.217.57.103] = did not pass 550-5.7.26    550-5.7.26  For instructions on setting up authentication, go to 550 5.7.26    https://support.google.com/mail/answer/81126#authentication    a640c23a62f3a-a868f486292si527771966b.522 - gsmtp
creator: info11792
